CutSceneText.Text: Muhaha, you Elyos traitor! It's great, incredible!!!
Thanks to you we were able to swipe the entire supplies of the Elyos fools! Muhahaha!
A traitor!? Watch your mouth, you fool!
What did you say!? Here I was going to go a bit easy on you for being somewhat useful...
Have you forgotten that you are banished from your own country?
You worthless Krall...!! I see that you want to die here!
Please stop, both of you. Surely you both must know that now is not the time for that?
You can always settle your differences after we kill all the Elyos in Tijerid.
By now those in Tijerid must think that something is wrong, as well.
We must complete the operation before the military intelligence provided by Lord Jurid becomes useless.
Then let us charge in and crush them all!
So we should first plan a course of action...
... Well then, let's continue on discussing our strategy.
